summary: Makes M\'aiq the Liar a follower with his original dialogue intact.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2elqssz.png[/img][/center]

This is a mod that allows you to make M\'aiq the Liar a follower when you find him on your journey.

v1.1 is released. 


Features:
- M\'aiq is recruitable
- Original dialogue intact
- Dual-wielding (\"M\'aiq carries two weapons, to be safe. What if one breaks? That would be most unlucky.\")
- Powerful spells at his disposal.
- The ability to shout. (\"M\'aiq does not understand what is so impressive about shouting. M\'aiq can shout whenever he wants.\")


Manual Installation:
Copy the .esp file to your Skyrim/Data directory.

NMM Installation:
Not tested yet.


Coming in v1.1
- Better dialogue reset times - Delayed due to a bug that made M\'aiq go silent. Will be fixed in 1.1.5
- Power rebalance - Done
- Perks - Done


Due to lack of time, I can\'t work on future versions a lot. If someone wants to keep on developing this mod, feel free to do so, but credit me for the mod base.


Changelog:

- 1.0: Initial release
- 1.1: Minor bug fixes

Compatibility/Issues:

Even though it shouldn\'t cause any issues, but if you happen to find bugs or compatibility issues with other mods, report them and I will try to have a fix ready as soon as possible.
author: ManWithoutArms
